name: LI
line: 十环的传说已经流传了上千年。

name: LI
line: 不论这个故事如何演变。

name: LI
line: 它的主人公永远都是同一个人。

name: LI
line: 有人说他的十环是火山口里捡来的 还有人说是墓穴里盗来的。

name: LI
line: 它们给了他神一般的力量，也赋予了他长生不老的魔法。

name: LI
line: 他本可借着十环之力来惩恶扬善。

name: LI
line: 但他想要的... 只有征服。

name: LI
line: 千百年来 他们扫荡了世界的每个角落。

name: LI
line: 凭借着士环之力他早已称霸天下。

name: WENWU
line: 你听说过大罗的传说吗？

name: WENWU
line: 一个隐世的村庄 在那里 神奇的功法代代相传。

name: WENWU
line: 传说中的神兽和古老的法术还都存在。

name: CHANCELLOR HUI
line: 明白。我这就派侦查队去一探究竟，然后有消息立马跟你汇报。

name: LI
line: 这世上再也没有可以让他征服的地方了。

name: LI
line: 于是他找上了我的家乡。

name: LI
line: 那是我第一次见到你的父亲。

name: LI
line: 我从没想过自己会为他动心。

name: LI
line: 尚气，十环的传说讲都讲不完，等你长大了自然就会了解到。

name: SHANG-CHI
line: 可爸爸的十环那么厉害，你是怎么打败他的？

name: LI
line: 妈妈的故乡大罗有一个神龙，它是我们的保护神。

name: LI
line: 等你领悟了神龙之心，你就可以做很多了不起的事情。

name: LI
line: 妈妈离开的时候把魔法还给了神龙，但是妈妈得到的更宝贵。

name: LI
line: 如果有一天你迷路了，它会帮你找到回家的路。

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Hello, sir, welcome to the Fairmont…

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Look, if happens to this thing, we’re gonna be jobless and in debt for the rest of our lives.

name: KATY
line: Oh, come on. Nothing’s gonna happen to this car.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I don’t know who that is.

name: KATY
line: Most career wins in all of NASCAR history?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Please get out of the car.

name: KATY
line: Shaun, we’ve been friends for 10 years, okay?

name: KATY
line: You know I’m not an idiot.

name: KATY
line: Please, get in. I’ll go slow.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I knew Katy was trouble the first day we met in high school.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I was getting picked on a lot, for all the reasons we all get picked on a lot.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Plus, I had just moved to the US, so I was struggling with my English, and I was on my way to lunch one day when this guy who was like twice my size yells at me from down the hall, “What’s up, Gangnam Style?”

name: SHANG-CHI
line: So I yelled back, “I’m not Korean, idiot.”

name: KATY
line: And I turn the corner, and I see this guy drop his backpack, he’s getting all up in his face…

name: SHANG-CHI
line: And right before he was about to throw the first punch,

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Katy comes out of nowhere, steps right between us and starts screaming the lyrics to Hotel California.

name: KATY
line: It’s the art of confusion. Works great on stupid people.

name: KATY
line: Then I pulled him into the parking lot…

name: SHANG-CHI
line: At which point she revealed that she had also swiped the keys to the guy’s Mustang.

name: KATY
line: Yeah, we went on a little joyride around the block.

name: KATY
line: And your wife was in the car, too.

name: SOO
line: I was just in the back seat.

name: KATY
line: That’s a part of the car.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: That’s still a part of the car.

name: JOHN
line: How have you never told me this story?

name: KATY
line: You know, before she was a lawyer,

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Yeah, what’s that supposed to mean?

name: SOO
line: where you’re supposed to stop going on joyrides and start thinking about living up to your potential.

name: KATY
line: Please tell me you’re kidding, Soo.

name: SOO
line: Look, we’re now living in a world where at any moment half the population can just disappear.

name: SOO
line: Life’s too short and too fragile.

name: SOO
line: Katy, you’re a valet driver with an honours degree from Berkeley, and Shaun can speak, like, four languages.

name: SOO
line: You’ve always been the most talented people I know.

name: SOO
line: I just don’t get why you’re scared

name: SOO
line: to actually use it for something serious.

name: KATY
line: You sound like my mom. You also… dress like her a little bit, too.

name: KATY
line: How is it running to have jobs that you actually like?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Yeah, that doesn’t even make any sense.

name: KATY
line: (FUMBLES) Did you think valet parking is easy?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: It’s like the most challenging job ever.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: You need people skills, driving skills…

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Well, it’s almost midnight. We got the early shift.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Should probably be responsible, go to sleep.

name: KATY
line: Yeah, we can be responsible. We can do that.

name: BOTH
line: (SINGING) ♪ Over, sideways and under on a… ♪

name: BOTH
line: ♪ Take my horse to the old town road ♪

name: MRS CHEN
line: Come have some joe while you wait.

name: KATY
line: Yeah, Mom, be there in a minute.

name: MRS CHEN
line: Ruihua, you’re supposed to be helping your dad stock the shop.

name: RUIHUA
line: Mom, I can’t work on an empty stomach, my legs get crampy.

name: RUIHUA
line: Maybe Shaun can help him instead of just showing up every day to eat our food.

name: MRS CHEN
line: No, it’s Ruihua’s job, let him do it.

name: WAIPO
line: He’s getting all his favourite things this year for the Day of the Dead.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Are you sure that Waigong’s allowed to take

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Funyuns and cigarettes back to the afterlife?

name: WAIPO
line: Last year I put a bottle of whisky on his grave…

name: WAIPO
line: And it was gone the next morning.

name: WAIPO
line: I know you kids think it’s silly.

name: KATY
line: We don’t think it’s silly, Waipo.

name: KATY
line: We just know Waigong would’ve wanted you to move on and enjoy your life.

name: MRS CHEN
line: Shaun, did my daughter apply to any new jobs this week?

name: MRS CHEN
line: Waigong didn’t move here from Hunan so you could park cars for a living.

name: KATY
line: Well, on that note, I think we’re gonna miss our bus.

name: KATY
line: I’m sorry for my unacceptable job.

name: KATY
line: And for staying out late last night, trying to enjoy my life.

name: KATY
line: But one day, I’ll make you proud, I promise.

name: KATY
line: Maybe one day you’ll pass your driver’s test, live the dream like me.

name: KATY
line: Look. Look at that. Look at that girl.

name: KATY
line: She’s writing a research paper on a bus.

name: KATY
line: That is exactly the daughter my mom wishes came out of her vagina.

name: GANG MEMBER
line: 项链给我，就没有人会受伤。

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I don’t know what you’re talking about, dude.

name: KATY
line: What is wrong with you, asshole?

name: KATY
line: Does he look like he can fight?

name: KLEV
line: Yo, what up, y’all? It’s your boy Klev, comin’ at you live on the bus.

name: KLEV
line: I actually did take a little bit of martial arts as a youth, so I’m gonna try and grade this fight as we’re goin’.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: You really wanna talk about this now?

name: KLEV
line: Every time I’ve tried to drive a bus, I get yelled at.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: The back is about to go.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: On my signal, make a hard right.

name: KLEV
line: What’s up, y’all? What’s up, y’all? What’s up, y’all?

name: RAZOR FIST
line: You and your sister deserve what’s coming.

name: KATY
line: You need to tell me what the hell’s going on.

name: KATY
line: What are you doing? Where are you going?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Those guys are going after my sister next, and I have to get to her first.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Look, I know this is confusing.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I’ll explain it when I get back, I promise.

name: KATY
line: I have been by your side for half your life.

name: KATY
line: I get there are things you never wanted to talk about, and I never wanted to push.

name: KATY
line: But a guy with a freaking machete for an arm just chopped our bus in half, Shaun!

name: SHANG-CHI
line: My sister sent me this a few months ago.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I think it’s the address of where she’s staying.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Those guys back there were sent by my dad.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I’m sorry, but I have to go.

name: KATY
line: You can explain on the plane.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: What? No, Katy, you can’t just…

name: KATY
line: You can explain on the plane, Shaun!

name: SHANG-CHI
line: After my mom died… my dad started my training.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: From sunup to sundown, I was taught every possible way to kill a man.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: By the time I was 14, I could barely remember what life was like before she died.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: That’s how old I was when he sent me on my first assignment.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I was willing to do anything he wanted.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: If he asked me to burn the world down, I would’ve asked him…

name: FLIGHT ATTENDANT
line: We’re all out of the chicken, so I can only offer you beef or vegetarian?

name: FLIGHT ATTENDANT
line: Oh, we’re out of the vegetarian too.

name: KATY
line: Beef. ‘Cause that’s all you have, right?

name: KATY
line: Did you go through with it?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I knew that I couldn’t go back to him, so I just… ran.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I know this is a lot to dump on you.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I should also probably mention that my name’s not technically Shaun.

name: KATY
line: You changed your name from Shang to Shaun?

name: KATY
line: I wonder how your father found you.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Okay, I was 15 years old. All right?

name: KATY
line: What is your name change logic?

name: KATY
line: And your name is Michael, you go on and change it to Mishael.

name: KATY
line: “I’m gonna go into hiding. My new name’s Gina.”

name: KATY
line: Yeah, okay. Oh, yeah, you can hear me.

name: KATY
line: And this elevator is definitely up to code.

name: KATY
line: There’s absolutely no chance of it just falling off the side of the building…

name: JON JON
line: 我靠，你三天就有200万浏览量！

name: JON JON
line: Welcome to the Golden Daggers Club.

name: JON JON
line: (SIGHS) Okay, let’s get you ready to fight.

name: JON JON
line: Every fight livestreamed on the dark web.

name: JON JON
line: Thousands of viewers placing bets as we speak.

name: JON JON
line: This is gonna take your brand to a whole new level.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Think there’s been some sort of confusion.

name: JON JON
line: Usually, you gotta fight your way to centre ring, but a viral star like you?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I’m not here to fight anybody. Okay?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I’m looking for my sister, Xu Xialing.

name: JON JON
line: We just lost a fighter at the last minute, so you get the next slot.

name: KATY
line: Is he gonna be fighting in one of these?

name: JON JON
line: Oh, no, no, no. These are like low-level fights.

name: JON JON
line: You’re gonna be fighting up there.

name: WONG
line: You want me to show you how it feels?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Yeah, look, I’m not going up there, okay?

name: JON JON
line: It’s too late to back out now.

name: JON JON
line: Dude, I saw you fight five assassins and a giant Romanian with a razor for an arm on a moving bus.

name: JON JON
line: Just do it. Then we all get paid, and then I’ll help you find whoever you’re looking for.

name: WONG
line: Maybe you’ll start controlling those punches like we practised?

name: JON JON
line: Ladies and gentlemen, the fight we’ve all been waiting for.

name: JON JON
line: The incredible viral sensation, all the way from San Francisco, USA, it’s Bus Boy!

name: JON JON
line: And his opponent for tonight, it’s Macau’s own fearsome killer…

name: XIALING
line: I know what you’re going there to do.

name: XIALING
line: I don’t know what he’s telling you, but Mom…

name: SHANG-CHI
line: 灵灵，我三天以后就回来。

name: JON JON
line: We love you, Xu Xialing! Whoo!

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Where’d you get all that money?

name: KATY
line: Everything that you do is, like, so cool.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: The Ten Rings ambushed us in San Francisco.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: They’re gonna come for yours next.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I don’t know what he wants with them, but we both know it can’t be good.

name: XIALING
line: You know what he said to me when he left?

name: XIALING
line: And after three days, I went to our mom’s shrine and waited.

name: XIALING
line: Three days turned into a week, a week turned to a month, and a month turned to six years.

name: XIALING
line: That’s how long it took me to realise I didn’t need him any more.

name: XIALING
line: I built this place on my own.

name: XIALING
line: I didn’t need you then, and I don’t need you now.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Then why would you send me the postcard?

name: KATY
line: Oh, hell no. Screw you! I’m not doing this.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: If we make it to the elevator, we can hop in on the next floor.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Katy, we’re out of options. We have to go now.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Just head straight for that elevator.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I’ll buy you some time. Just keep going.

name: KATY
line: (SINGING HOTEL CALIFORNIA BY EAGLES) ♪ On a dark desert highway ♪

name: SHANG-CHI
line: 你把我们丢在这里说走就走！

name: XIALING
line: 现在你知道什么滋味了。

name: SHANG-CHI
line: What does he want with the pendant…

name: WENWU
line: I told my men they wouldn’t be able to kill you if they tried.

name: WENWU
line: Take the girls to their room.

name: KATY
line: I’ve seen some really scary stuff this week, but your dad’s on, like, a whole ‘nother level.

name: XIALING
line: Just nod. Don’t talk. He’ll forget you’re there.

name: KATY
line: He always treat you like that?

name: XIALING
line: He said he couldn’t look at me because I reminded him of her.

name: XIALING
line: I wasn’t allowed to train with the boys.

name: XIALING
line: But I watched everything they did and taught myself to do it better.

name: XIALING
line: I ran away when I was 16.

name: XIALING
line: As soon as I knew my brother wasn’t coming back.

name: KATY
line: You started an underground fight ring in Macau when you were 16 years old?

name: XIALING
line: If my dad won’t let me into his empire, I’m gonna build my own.

name: WENWU
line: Have you been practicing your English?

name: WENWU
line: You have to strengthen your mind along with your body.

name: WENWU
line: If you want them to be yours one day, you have to show me you’re strong enough to carry them.

name: WENWU
line: I always know where my children are.

name: WENWU
line: I gave you 10 years to live your life, and where did it get you?

name: WENWU
line: Now it’s time for you to take your place by my side.

name: WENWU
line: They connect us not only to ourselves, but to everyone who came before.

name: WENWU
line: Some years ago, a terrorist from America needed a boogeyman to bring your country to its knees.

name: WENWU
line: So, he appropriated The Ten Rings.

name: WENWU
line: But because he didn’t know my actual name, he invented a new one.

name: WENWU
line: Do you know the name he chose?

name: WENWU
line: He gave his figurehead the name of a chicken dish.

name: WENWU
line: The truth is, I’ve had many names throughout my life.

name: WENWU
line: The Warrior King, Master Khan, the most dangerous man on Earth.

name: WENWU
line: For years, I thought that was all I was meant to be.

name: WENWU
line: But when I met their mother, everything changed.

name: WENWU
line: She showed me a part of myself I didn’t know was there.

name: WENWU
line: It was like I was seeing the world for the first time.

name: WENWU
line: She gave up everything so we could be together.

name: WENWU
line: After all those years, I finally found something worth growing old for.

name: WENWU
line: She was the only one who called me that.

name: WENWU
line: And when she died… I was lost for many years.

name: WENWU
line: But I’m not lost any more.

name: WENWU
line: When you children ran away, I was so desperate to connect with your mother, I threw myself back into the studies of her village.

name: WENWU
line: I wasn’t able to find the secret path to the village entrance, but I did find what they are hiding.

name: WENWU
line: There’s a gate deep in their mountains.

name: WENWU
line: Your mother is waiting for us there.

name: WENWU
line: I know this is a lot.

name: WENWU
line: I might not have believed it if she didn’t tell me herself.

name: WENWU
line: I was sitting right here in this seat, deep in my research… and she spoke to me.

name: WENWU
line: It was like she was standing in this room.

name: WENWU
line: I could feel her breath on my cheek and her hand on my back.

name: WENWU
line: She told me she needs my help.

name: WENWU
line: To save her from her people.

name: WENWU
line: After we fell in love, your mother wanted us to live in Ta Lo.

name: WENWU
line: She asked permission from the elders, and they refused.

name: WENWU
line: She would still be with us.

name: WENWU
line: We would all be living there together.

name: WENWU
line: Ta Lo did this to us.

name: WENWU
line: They locked her behind that gate to punish her.

name: WENWU
line: She wants us to find her and bring her home, so we can be a family again.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: She’s not talking to you from behind a gate, and she’s not leaving any clues for us.

name: WENWU
line: The passage to Ta Lo is guarded by a moving maze.

name: WENWU
line: But there’s a direct path through the forest that only opens once a year on Qingming Jie.

name: WENWU
line: To get through, you need to know the route and the exact time it opens.

name: WENWU
line: Three days from now, we will rescue my wife from her prison and bring her home.

name: WENWU
line: To help me bring her back to us.

name: XIALING
line: And what happens if they don’t let you open the gate?

name: WENWU
line: We’ll burn the village to the ground.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: You can’t just march into our mom’s village with this bullshit.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I mean, do you have any idea how insane…

name: LI
line: 咱们一家人很快就能在一起了。

name: KATY
line: So, um, pretty confused right now, because, uh, initially I thought your dad should definitely see a therapist for his delusions, but then that dragon vomited a magical water map, and now I have no idea what’s real.

name: KATY
line: Is what he said about your mom’s village true?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: She used to tell us stories about Ta Lo when we were kids.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: A village in another dimension full of magical creatures.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I thought it was just a fairy tale.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: About Mom being locked behind a gate by her own people?

name: XIALING
line: Crazier things have turned out to be true.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Look, I don’t know what the hell is going on, but if we don’t find a way to get to Ta Lo before him, he’s gonna destroy everything that’s left of our family.

name: XIALING
line: This family was destroyed a long time ago.

name: TREVOR
line: I’ve been preparing a monologue for your homecoming dinner.

name: TREVOR
line: Well, some time ago, I was offered the role of a terrorist.

name: TREVOR
line: I know, facile, trite, I couldn’t agree more.

name: TREVOR
line: But times were lean, you know what I mean?

name: TREVOR
line: Anyway, the producer told me he worked for the BBC.

name: TREVOR
line: But, ironic twist, it turns out he, in fact, was a terrorist, and I wasn’t playing a character at all, but what I now recognise to be a rather unflattering portrait of your father.

name: TREVOR
line: We all got our just deserts.

name: TREVOR
line: The producer got blown up by Iron Man, and I served time in federal prison, which turned out to be the best thing for me.

name: TREVOR
line: I got clean, I rediscovered my passion.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Then my dad broke you out?

name: TREVOR
line: But just as his men were tying me up for my execution, I launched into a performance of my Macbeth.

name: TREVOR
line: “Whence is that knocking? Wake Duncan with thy knocking. I would’st though could’st…”

name: TREVOR
line: They couldn’t get enough of it.

name: TREVOR
line: I’ve been doing weekly gigs for the lads ever since.

name: TREVOR
line: I can give you a quick preview if you like.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Uh, thank you, Trevor. I think we’re okay.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Right now, we really just need to find a way to…

name: TREVOR
line: They can see you! You’re real!

name: TREVOR
line: All this time I thought I was hallucinating him.

name: TREVOR
line: Oh, this is such fab news.

name: TREVOR
line: He’s a bit sensitive about that.

name: TREVOR
line: Morris says he knows who you are.

name: KATY
line: It talks… It talks to you?

name: TREVOR
line: (CHUCKLES) If he didn’t talk to me, I’d have gone mad yonks ago.

name: TREVOR
line: He says he grew up with your mum. In Ta Lo.

name: TREVOR
line: Apparently, your father picked him up in some magic forest on one of his expeditions to find the entrance.

name: TREVOR
line: He wants you to take him home.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Believe me, buddy, I would if I knew how.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: According to my dad, the path there only opens once a year.

name: TREVOR
line: Morris says he can guide you there right now.

name: TREVOR
line: You can get through the maze without waiting for the path to open.

name: TREVOR
line: But, and it’s a big “but,” it’s very dangerous.

name: TREVOR
line: No one’s ever made it out alive.

name: TREVOR
line: But Morris is 90% confident he can guide us through safely.

name: KATY
line: Look, I’ve done dumber things with worse odds.

name: KATY
line: But even if that chicken-pig is right…

name: XIALING
line: Dad has a tunnel system under the whole compound.

name: XIALING
line: That’s how I escaped last time.

name: XIALING
line: This will take us straight to the garage.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Just head up that ramp and through the front gate.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Figure we got about 30 seconds until he…

name: TREVOR
line: I get sick in the back. Carsick.

name: XIALING
line: The other end of the garage.

name: XIALING
line: But we need a fingerprint to open it.

name: AUTOMATED VOICE
line: Scan hand print for gate access.

name: WENWU
line: They will come back once I bring her home.

name: TREVOR
line: The first time I witnessed pure artistry.

name: TREVOR
line: I was sitting in the cinema next to my mum, watching mastery unfold before my very eyes.

name: TREVOR
line: After the film, I asked her, “How did they get those monkeys to do those things?”

name: TREVOR
line: And she patted me on the head and she said, “It’s not real, pet. It’s just acting.”

name: TREVOR
line: If they can teach those monkeys to act that brilliantly, just imagine what I could bring to the world.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: So you became an actor because you thought the monkeys were actually…

name: TREVOR
line: When, in fact, they were simply acting as if they were riding horses.

name: TREVOR
line: I still can’t get my head round it, to be honest.

name: KATY
line: You found your passion and went for it, and eventually used it to cripple the US government, but whatever.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Um, this is really cool and all, but how long do we have to sit here?

name: TREVOR
line: The way through is all about timing.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Okay, but how long are we talking?

name: TREVOR
line: Friends, I am but a transitory vessel for the infinite wisdom of a creature far more advanced than we’ll ever truly understand.

name: TREVOR
line: What he sees, what he feels of this vast, unknown universe is beyond anything our simple brains can…

name: TREVOR
line: Go. You can go. He says “go.”

name: TREVOR
line: It’s all about staying in the pocket.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: What happens if we don’t stay in the pocket?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Eats us? What does that mean?

name: TREVOR
line: He says it eats us. Go left.

name: KATY
line: Will you just stop saying, “Stay in the pocket”?

name: TREVOR
line: One last right, then straight on to the end.

name: KATY
line: What do you think I’m doing?

name: TREVOR
line: Now, all we have to do is go through that waterfall, and we’re pretty much there.

name: TREVOR
line: I think those birds are on fire.

name: TREVOR
line: What’s it looking at me for?

name: YING NAN
line: Look who has found his way home! (CHUCKLES)

name: YING NAN
line: Our people have been here for over 4,000 years, preparing for something we hope will never happen.

name: YING NAN
line: We are the keepers of the Dark Gate, sworn to protect this realm and yours from the evil that’s locked behind it.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Our dad is coming here to open that gate.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: He thinks you’re holding our mom there.

name: XIALING
line: He says he can hear her asking for help.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: He hasn’t taken them off since she died.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: What do they have to do with all this?

name: YING NAN
line: The realm of Ta Lo stretches far beyond the shores of our small village.

name: YING NAN
line: We have cities that surpass any in your universe, rich with culture and history.

name: YING NAN
line: Thousands of years ago, all of our people lived in peace and prosperity, until the attack of the Dweller-in-Darkness.

name: YING NAN
line: He came with his army, devouring every soul in their path, and with each kill, they grew stronger.

name: YING NAN
line: After decimating our largest cities, they were headed to your universe to do the same.

name: YING NAN
line: The leaders of Ta Lo sent their strongest warriors here to stop them from reaching the portal to your world.

name: YING NAN
line: But our ancestors were no match for them.

name: YING NAN
line: Until The Great Protector joined their fight and turned the tide.

name: YING NAN
line: Together, they pushed the Dweller and his army into the Dark Gate and locked it behind them.

name: YING NAN
line: Our people have guarded that gate ever since, empowered by the magic of The Great Protector and the gift that she gave us.

name: YING NAN
line: Your father isn’t the first to come here to open the Dark Gate.

name: YING NAN
line: Many have tried and failed over the centuries, and they all had one thing in common.

name: YING NAN
line: They were lured here by the voice of something on the other side.

name: YING NAN
line: A voice that promised them their greatest desires.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: So you think soul eaters are talking to our dad?

name: YING NAN
line: They know The Ten Rings have the power to break them free.

name: KATY
line: Um, looks like I’m gonna go deliver some dragon arrows.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Oh, you’re gonna deliver some dragon arrows?

name: KATY
line: Yeah. Make myself useful, you know.

name: KATY
line: I just love how you guys know exactly what you wanna do, and you spend your whole life getting really good at it.

name: KATY
line: I wish I was more like that.

name: KATY
line: It’s like every time I get moderately good at something, I just quit and start something new.

name: KATY
line: But I just know my own limits, and I’m not gonna waste my time chasing something that will ultimately be a disappointment for me.

name: TA LO VILLAGER
line: 如果你心中没有靶子，就是无的放矢。

name: YING NAN
line: She knew that one day you would find your way here and asked me to prepare something for your arrival.

name: YING NAN
line: After losing someone like her, it’s easy to feel alone in this world.

name: YING NAN
line: You are children of this family, and I welcome you home.

name: YING NAN
line: 在大罗，每个人都可以练武。

name: YING NAN
line: 是时候从影子里走出来了，孩子。

name: SHANG-CHI
line: My mother was the only one who could beat him.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Show me how she did it.

name: YING NAN
line: Your mother knew who she was.

name: YING NAN
line: You are a product of all who came before you.

name: YING NAN
line: The legacy of your family, the good and the bad, it is all a part of who you are.

name: WENWU
line: The passage will open at dawn.

name: LI
line: 以气运身，要先掌握阴阳的转换。

name: LI
line: 你才能找到内心的平衡，从而真正认识自己。

name: LI
line: 他已经不是以前的那个人了。

name: LI
line: 你们之间的事情跟我的孩子们无关。

name: GANG LEADER
line: 放了他们可以，但这个礼必须有人来接吧。

name: SHANG-CHI
line: 可是你现在没有魔法了呀。

name: WENWU
line: 如果我当初没有把它们摘下来，那些混蛋根本就不敢动手。

name: WENWU
line: We found the man responsible for killing your mother.

name: WENWU
line: It is your right to finish this for both of us.

name: WENWU
line: And when you return, we will rebuild The Ten Rings to what it once was.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I’m not who you think I am.

name: KATY
line: You already apologised for that. We’re good…

name: SHANG-CHI
line: That’s not what I’m talking about.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: When my dad sent me to find the man who killed my mom…

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I told you I couldn’t go through with it.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I thought that I could change my name, start a new life, pretend like it never happened.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: She would hate the person I’ve become.

name: KATY
line: Your dad trained you to be an assassin when you were seven.

name: KATY
line: He sent you on a hit at 14.

name: KATY
line: You realise how messed up that is, right?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: My mom is dead because of him.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: And now he’s coming to destroy her home.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: I’m gonna do what he trained me to do.

name: WENWU
line: Are you here to help the people holding your own mother captive?

name: YING NAN
line: You’re being lied to by a creature who wants to destroy us all.

name: WENWU
line: Is that what they told you?

name: YING NAN
line: I miss my sister as much as you do, but this is not the way to honour her memory.

name: WENWU
line: Did you honour her when you turned her away from your gate?

name: GUANG BO
line: 混账。我们拒绝的人是你。

name: GUANG BO
line: 树去造的孽会毁了这个地方。

name: WENWU
line: 小子，跟我讲话礼貌点厂。

name: WENWU
line: 我吃的盐比你吃的饭还要多。

name: WENWU
line: Are you planning to stop me all by yourself?

name: WENWU
line: You’ve spent your entire life afraid.

name: WENWU
line: You were there when they came for her, and you did nothing.

name: WENWU
line: You stood at a window and watched her die!

name: SHANG-CHI
line: She was gone and we needed you.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: But you chose those damn rings over us. (SNIFFLES)

name: SHANG-CHI
line: You trained your son to be a killer.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Even if you could bring her back,

name: SHANG-CHI
line: what makes you think she’d want anything to do with you?

name: XIALING
line: Those things are gonna kill us all if we don’t work together.

name: RAZOR FIST
line: You think I’m going to fall for that?

name: YING NAN
line: Your weapons are useless against them.

name: RAZOR FIST
line: We are the mighty Ten Rings, and any…

name: YING NAN
line: Stealing souls to feed the Dweller-in-Darkness.

name: YING NAN
line: If it grows strong enough, it will break right through the gate.

name: KATY
line: I have to help my friends.

name: GUANG BO
line: 所有人马上到湖边集合。

name: LI
line: 你是妈妈的血脉。也是爸爸的。

name: LI
line: 你要把我们给你的一切化成你自己的力量。

name: YING NAN
line: You have to stop your father!

name: WENWU
line: Get out of my way, boy.

name: TREVOR
line: I’m not dead, it’s just a performance.

name: TREVOR
line: Now get down here and play along.

name: GUANG BO
line: 如果神龙龙的灵魂被吞掉了，

name: GUANG BO
line: 那就什么都阻止不了它了！

name: YING NAN
line: Tonight, we honour those who gave their lives so we might see another day.

name: YING NAN
line: They were our mothers and fathers, our sisters and brothers.

name: YING NAN
line: And though we will always hold on to their memories, tonight we release them to rest with our ancestors.

name: YING NAN
line: A thousand years ago, and a thousand years from now, we will always be together.

name: KATY
line: I seriously thought we were going to die.

name: KATY
line: And I’d only learned how to shoot a bow, like, a day earlier, now I’m on a battlefield, killing all these Soul Suckers with Shaun’s aunty, who’s this awesome, magical kung fu goddess.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: And I’m hanging on to The Great Protector with my sister at this point, trying not to get eaten by the Mega Soul Sucker.

name: KATY
line: Oh, the Mega Soul Sucker was such a nasty bitch.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Yeah. It was trying to eat our dragon’s soul.

name: KATY
line: Which would have allowed it to destroy the entire universe.

name: KATY
line: I only had one arrow left, and all I could hear in the back of my mind was my mom’s voice saying, “Just take the shot, you little mooch!”

name: KATY
line: And so, I aimed right for the Sucker’s throat and I let her fly.

name: KATY
line: And then Shaun used the Ten Rings to do this crazy Kamehameha fireball that exploded the thing…

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Yeah, we, uh, lost some good people that day… but we made it.

name: KATY
line: Oh, no. We’re not mocking you.

name: SOO
line: So where is this sister of yours?

name: SHANG-CHI
line: She’s back at my dad’s compound, shutting down his operations.

name: KATY
line: Yeah, his dad was the head of The Ten Rings for the past thousand years.

name: SOO
line: Two weeks ago, you were parking cars for tips, and you want me to believe you’re now saving the world from soul-sucking monsters?

name: SOO
line: I know, you’re trying to get me back for what I said last time, but I’m not gonna apologise…

name: SOO
line: …for speaking the truth as a friend.

name: SOO
line: I really meant what I said, and, in fact, I actually think this whole bit you’re doing just further proves my point.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Yeah, I know, sir. I’m a huge fan…

name: WONG
line: Good. Let’s go, we have a lot to talk about.

name: KATY
line: I know this is, like, crazy, but I’m gonna text you, and we’ll do this again. Nice to see you, John.

name: WONG
line: They don’t match any artefacts from our codex.

name: CAROL
line: Not like any alien tech I’ve seen.

name: CAROL
line: How long did your dad have them before he gave them to you?

name: BRUCE
line: Their thermoluminescence indicates they’re older than that.

name: WONG
line: The first time you used the rings, we felt it in Kamar-Taj.

name: CAROL
line: I’m so sorry. I have to deal with this.

name: CAROL
line: You can get my number from Bruce.

name: CAROL
line: It was so nice to meet you.

name: BRUCE
line: Yeah, I… I don’t have her number.

name: BRUCE
line: She… She does this a lot.

name: WONG
line: I know this is a lot to take in, but you’re gonna have to start getting used to that.

name: WONG
line: From now on, the trajectory of your lives will be like nothing you’ve ever experienced before.

name: WONG
line: You both have a long journey ahead of you.

name: SHANG-CHI
line: Yeah. Yeah, we probably should do that.

name: XIALING
line: We have a lot of work to do.
